text: David Benjamin Bolen (December 23, 1923 - December 10, 2022) is an American Olympic track and field athlete, politician and businessman. Bolen was born in Heflin, Louisiana. He was an Ambassador to Botswana, Swaziland, Lesotho and East Germany. His diplomatic career lasted from 1974 until 1980 during the Richard Nixon, Gerald Ford and Jimmy Carter presidencies. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:American sprinters Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Politicians from Louisiana Category:Businesspeople from Louisiana Category:Sportspeople from Louisiana
title: Dave Bolen
